gurmukhi: dÍIpin Awid Sbd ko id`jY ]qw pwCy cr Sbd Bin`jY ]S`qRu Sbd ko bhur aucwro ]nwm qupk ky skl svwro ]778]
transliteration: Dveepan(i) Aadh Shabad Ke Deejjai|| Taa Paachhe Char Shabad Bhanijjai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Oucdaro|| Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Sadaro||778||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Dvipani”, then utter the words “Char” and “Shatru”, and comprehend all the names of Tupak.778.

gurmukhi: siRStn pd ko Awid aucwro ]jw kih pd pwCy dY fwro ]S`qRu Sbd ko bhur Bix`jY ]nwm quPMg cIn icq il`jY ]779]
transliteration: Srishtan Pad Ko Aadh Oucdaro|| Jaa Kah(i) Pad Paachhe Dai Daro|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bhanijjai|| Naam Touphan Cheen Chit Lujjai||779||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Srishtani”, then add the words “Jaa” and “Shatru” and in this way recognize the names of Tupak in your mind.779.

gurmukhi: Drin Sbd ko Awid aucwro ]jwcr pd pwCy iqih fwro ]S`qRu Sbd ko bhur bKwnhu ]sB sRI nwm qupk ky jwnhu ]780]
transliteration: Dharan(i) Shabad Ko Aadh Oucdaro|| Jaachar Pad Paachhe Tih(i) Daar|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bakhaanoh|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Ke Jaanoh||780||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Dharni”, then add the words “Jaa”, “Char” and “Shatru” and in this way comprehend all the names of Tupak.780.

gurmukhi: Drw Sbd ko Awid bKwno ]jwcr pd pwCy iqh Twno ]S`qRu Sbd ko bhur aucwro ]nwm quPMg skl icq Dwro ]781]
transliteration: Dharaa Shabad Ko Aadh Bakhaano|| Jaachar Paachhe Tih Thaano|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Oucdaro|| Naam Touphan Sakal Chit Ddaro||781||
translation: Say firstly the word “Dharaa”, then utter the words “Jaa”, “Char” and “Shatru”, adopt the names of Tupak in your mind.781.

gurmukhi: BUimj Awid aucwr kY cr pd bhur aucwr ]irp kih nwiek quPMg ky lIjhu su kib suDwr ]782]
transliteration: Bhoomij Aadh Ouchaar Kai Char Pad Bahur Ouchaar|| Rip Kah(i) Naaik Touphan Ke Leejoh Su Kabi Sudhaar||782||
translation: Utter the word “Bhoomij” and then saying “Char-ripu”, comprehend correctly the names of Tuak, the hero of the army.782.

gurmukhi: dRumnI Awid aucwrn kIjY ]jwcr kih nwiek pd dIjY ]S`qRu Sbd ko bhur bKwno ]nwm qupk ky sB pihcwno ]783]
transliteration: Droumaniaadh Ouchaaran Keejai|| Jaachar Kah(i) Naaik Pad Deejai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bakhaano|| Naam Toupak Ke Sabh Paihchaano||783||
translation: Know all the names of Tupak by firstly uttering the word “Drumani” then adding “Jaa, Char, Nayak and Shatru”.783.

gurmukhi: biRC inj Awid aucwrn kIjY ]crnwidk pwCy pd dIjY ]S`qRu Sbd ko bhur Bix`jY ]nwm quPMg cIn icq il`jY ]784]
transliteration: Brichh Nij Aadh Ouchaaran Keejai|| Chrnaadik Paachhe Pad Deejai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bhanijai|| Naam Touphan Cheen Chit Lijjai||784||
translation: Comprehend the names of Tupak by firstly uttering “Vrakhneej” thane adding “Charanadik” and saying the word “Shatru”.784.

gurmukhi: DreysrxI Awid bKwno ]qw pwCy jwcr pd Twno ]S`qRu Sbd ko bhur bKwnhu ]sB sRI nwm qupk ky jwnhu ]785]
transliteration: Ddaresraniaadh Bakhaano|| Taa Paachhe Jaachar Pad Thaano|| Shattru Shabad Ko Bahur Bakhaanoh|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Ke Jaanoh||785||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Dhar-aishvaryani” and then adding “Jaa, char and shatru” and comprehend all the names of Tupak.785.

gurmukhi: DrwrwtnI Awid aucwro ]jw nwiek cr Sbd ibcwro ]sB sRI nwm qupk ky jwno ]Xw mY kCU Byd nhI mwno ]786]
transliteration: Dharaa-raatniaadh Oucdaro|| Jaa Naaik Char Shabad Bicdaro|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Ke Jaano|| Yaa Mai Kachhodh Bhed Nahimaano||786||
translation: Saying firstly “Dharaa-raatani”, then speak “Jaa-char-nayak” and knowing all the names of Tupak, do not consider any discrimination in it.786.

gurmukhi: bwirDnI Sbdwid aucwrn kIjIAY ]jwcr nwiek Sbd AMq iqh dIjIAY ]S`qRu Sbd ko qwky AMq aucwrIAY ]ho skl qupk ky nwm cqur icq DwrIAY ]787]
transliteration: Baaridhanishabadaadh Ouchaaran Keejeeai|| Jaachar Naaik Shabad Ant Tih Deejeeai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Taake Ant Oucdareeai|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Chatur Chit Ddareeai||787||
translation: Utter firstly the word “Vaaridhni”, after that add “Jaa-char-nayak”, then after adding the word “Shatru”’ in this way adopt all the names of Tupak in your mind.787.

gurmukhi: swmu`dRn Sbdwid aucwro jwn kY ]jwcr pd qwky pun pwCy Twn kY ]S`qRu Sbd ko qwky AMq aucwrIAY ]ho skl qupk ky nwm pRbIn ibcwrIAY ]788]
transliteration: Saamuddran Shabadaadh Ouchdaro Jaan Kai|| Jaachar Pad Taake Poun Paachhe Thaan Kai|| Shattru Shabad Ko Taake Ant Ouchdareeat|| Ho Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Prabeen Bicdareeai||788||
translation: Utter firstly the word “Saamundrani”, after that add and speak the words “Jaa, char and shatru”, O skilful people, consider all the names of Tupak.788.
